translations.session_expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
translations.hero_description: Professional Server Management System for your virtual machines, game servers and websites
translations.ticket_closed_message: This ticket is closed. You cannot add further replies.
translations.no_tickets_message: You haven't created any support tickets yet. Create your first ticket to get help.
translations.registration_submitted_message: Your domain registration has been successfully submitted. We will review it and get back to you.
translations.confirm_approve: Do you really want to approve this registration?
translations.confirm_reject: Do you really want to reject this registration?
translations.confirm_cancel: Do you really want to cancel this registration?
translations.domain_available_message: This domain is available and can be registered.
translations.domain_not_available_message: This domain is already taken. Here are some alternatives:
translations.domain_registration_info: Your domain registration will be reviewed by our team. We will get back to you within 24 hours.
translations.domain_check_info_rate_limit: Note: There must be 2 seconds between domain checks.
translations.no_update_available: No update available. System is up to date.
translations.select_update_type_error: Please select an update type and check for updates.
translations.reload_page_info: Please reload the page to see the changes.
translations.framework_only_description: Updates only the framework (framework.php, config/, src/core/). Ideal for minimal updates without UI changes.
translations.full_update_description: Updates the complete system including all modules, templates and assets. Keeps sys.conf.php.
translations.nightly_version_warning: The version in sys.conf.php does not match the CHANGELOG.md. This version is considered a Nightly Version and should only be used at your own risk.
translations.new_system_user_note: New system users are automatically created in the local database and can then be linked to external systems.
translations.merge_users_note: Users from different systems can be merged if they have the same email address.
